alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 17 at 7:57PM EDT until April 17 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Jefferson County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 900 PM EDT. * At 757 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles east of Tallahassee, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Monticello, Alma, Dills, Cody, Hells Half Acre, Lamont, Nash, Thomas City, Drifton, Casa Blanco, Waukeenah, Wacissa, Wacissa Springs, Lake Miccosukee, Fincher, Goose Pasture, Festus, Aucilla, Capps and Lois. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
